title: SOLD: 1914 T330-2 Piedmont Art Stamp - ED WALSH (HOF) - SGC 30
author: h2oya311

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1914 T330-2 Piedmont Art Stamp - ED WALSH (HOF) - SGC 30
posts.post_content:
Up for sale is the following Piedmont Art Stamp of HOFer Ed Walsh.  The stamp presents much nicer than the assigned grade (SGC 30).  While all Piedmont Art Stamps are scarce, this one has the even scarcer Factory 42 back. 
 
I have had it listed on eBay at $795 and have received a few offers, but none high enough to pull the trigger.

$SOLD net to me would get a deal done.
 
email me at [url]h2oya311@yahoo.com[/url] if interested.

[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/baseballstamps/1914piedmontstampextras/websize/1914%20Walsh%2042%20_extra_.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/baseballstamps/1914piedmontstampextras/websize/1914%20Walsh%2042%20_extra_%20_back_.jpg[/IMG]
